Query 3

history.query:
mutation {
  createStripePlatformCard(
    cvc: 314,
    expMonth: 8,
    expYear: 2021,
    name: "Oleh Puryshev",
    number: "4242424242424242"
  ) {
    id
    brand
    clientIp
    created
    cvcCheck
    expMonth
    expYear
    funding
    idFromStripe
    idFromCustomer
    last4
    name
    token
    userId
  }
}
